author: Steven Russolillo
title: Bitcoin Is Falling Fast, Losing More Than Half Its Value in Six Weeks
text:
Bitcoin plunged below $8,000 on Friday, extending its sharp rout since the start of the year in a selloff triggered by a widening regulatory crackdown on cryptocurrencies.
Around midday in Europe, Bitcoin was down nearly 12% on the day at around $8,070, after touching $7,995.61, the lowest level seen since November.
